Plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.
Title: The Crow
Writer: James O'Barr (comic book series and comic strip), David J. Schow (screenplay), John Shirley (screenplay)
Actors: Brandon Lee, Rochelle Davis, Ernie Hudson, Michael Wincott
tomatoConsensus: Filled with style and dark, lurid energy, The Crow is an action-packed visual feast that also has a soul in the performance of the late Brandon Lee.
